General.Name: Compleo Charging Solutions AG
General.Description: CCS Abwicklungs AG does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was engaged in the provision of charging technology for electric vehicles in Europe. The company was formerly known as Compleo Charging Solutions AG and changed its name to CCS Abwicklungs AG in July 2023. CCS Abwicklungs AG was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Dortmund, Germany.
